tasks.label: Run TensorBoard
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && tensorboard --bind_all --port=7777 --logdir logs

tasks.label: Run Hunter Testing Initial Locomotion
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +domain_rand=NO_domain_rand +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_locomotion_plane +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=16 project_name=TestInitialLoco experiment_name=Hunter_loco_IsaacSim headless=False > test.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Stage 0 Plane Terrain Full Training Hunter Headless
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +domain_rand=NO_domain_rand +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_locomotion_plane +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=4096 project_name=Stage0FullTrainingHunter experiment_name=HunterTraining headless=True" > full_training_hunter.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter Locomotion Model with Pseudo-Random Lateral Pushes
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_133824-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_5600.pt +simulator=isaacsim +domain_rand.push_robots=True +domain_rand.max_push_vel_xy=0.7 +domain_rand.push_interval_s=[3,8]" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter - Forward Locomotion Scenario
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.XAUTHORITY xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_133824-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_5600.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=60 +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_x=[0.5,0.5] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_y=[0.0,0.0] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.ang_vel_yaw=[0.0,0.0] ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=1000.0 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter - Manual Control Mode
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_76400.pt +exp=locomotion +simulator=isaacsim ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Run Hunter Testing Initial Locomotion Tilled Soil
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion algo=ppo_soil +domain_rand=YES_domain_rand_soil +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_soil_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_tilled_soil ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=16 project_name=TestInitialLocoTilledSoil experiment_name=Hunter_loco_IsaacSim_TilledSoil headless=False > train.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Full Training Hunter Headless Soil Terrain
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion algo=ppo_soil +domain_rand=YES_domain_rand_soil +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_soil_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_tilled_soil ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=2048 project_name=FullTrainingHunterSoil experiment_name=FullTrainingHunterSoil headless=True" > full_training_hunter_soil.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Full Training Hunter Headless Soil Terrain (High Memory)
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion algo=ppo_soil +domain_rand=YES_domain_rand_soil +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_soil_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_tilled_soil ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=4096 project_name=FullTrainingHunterSoil experiment_name=FullTrainingHunterSoil headless=True" > full_training_hunter_soil.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter - Manual Control Mode Soil Terrain
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/FullTrainingHunterSoil/20250730_075343-FullTrainingHunterSoil-locomotion-hunter/model_10000.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_soil_locomotion +terrain=terrain_tilled_soil ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 0: Hunter Plane Training (Test)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=16 project_name=CurriculumStage0Test experiment_name=Hunter_Stage0_Plane headless=False > stage0_test.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 0: Hunter Plane Training (Full)
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=4096 project_name=CurriculumStage0 experiment_name=Hunter_Stage0_Plane headless=True" > stage0_full.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 1: Hunter Soil Training (Test) - Load model_157400.pt
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_157400.pt num_envs=16 project_name=CurriculumStage1Test experiment_name=Hunter_Stage1_SoftSoil_From157400 headless=False > stage1_test.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 1: Hunter Soil Training (Full) - Load model_157400.pt
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_157400.pt num_envs=2048 project_name=CurriculumStage1 experiment_name=Hunter_Stage1_SoftSoil_From157400 headless=True" > stage1_full.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 2: Hunter Full Randomization (Test)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage2_full_rand +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 num_envs=16 project_name=CurriculumStage2Test experiment_name=Hunter_Stage2_FullRand headless=False > stage2_test.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 2: Hunter Full Randomization (Full)
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage2_full_rand +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 num_envs=2048 project_name=CurriculumStage2 experiment_name=Hunter_Stage2_FullRand headless=True" > stage2_full.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 1: Hunter Soil Training (Continue from Stage 0)
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage0/latest/model.pt num_envs=2048 project_name=CurriculumStage1Continue experiment_name=Hunter_Stage1_FromStage0 headless=True" > stage1_continue.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Curriculum Stage 2: Hunter Full Randomization (Continue from Stage 1)
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +curriculum=stage2_full_rand +robot=hunter/hunter +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage1/latest/model.pt num_envs=2048 project_name=CurriculumStage2Continue experiment_name=Hunter_Stage2_FromStage1 headless=True" > stage2_continue.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Test model_157400.pt on Stage 0 Curriculum
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_157400.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_model157400_stage0.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Test model_157400.pt on Stage 1 Curriculum (Baseline)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_157400.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_model157400_stage1.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 0: Hunter Plane Model
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/Stage0FullTrainingHunter/20250731_183713-HunterTraining-locomotion-hunter/model_157400.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage0.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 1: Hunter Soil Model
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage1/latest/model.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage1.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 2: Hunter Full Randomization Model
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage2_full_rand +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage2/latest/model.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage2.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 1 Model on Stage 0 Terrain (Regression Test)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage1/latest/model.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage1_on_stage0.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 2 Model on Stage 0 Terrain (Regression Test)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage0_plane +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage2/latest/model.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage2_on_stage0.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Stage 2 Model on Stage 1 Terrain (Progression Test)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +curriculum=stage1_soft_soil +robot=hunter/hunter +checkpoint=logs/CurriculumStage2/latest/model.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++simulator.config.scene.env_spacing=4.0 ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval_stage2_on_stage1.log 2>&1" &
